name: Dire Pangolin
description: A large, armored creature with sharp, edged scales and a formidable presence.
memorable: The pangolin's unique ability to curl into a protective ball makes it a challenging opponent.
goals: To defend its territory from intruders and predators.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other beasts or in rugged environments.
environment: Often found in environments where it can utilize its climbing ability and natural defenses.
strengths: Exceptional physical power enhances its damage output; resistant to certain damage types.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Intelligence creates vulnerabilities that can be exploited easily.
attacks: Uses multiattack with claws and a tail slap, capable of dealing significant slashing and piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Edged Scales inflict slashing damage on creatures that make melee attacks against it.
senses: The Dire Pangolin has keen senses, allowing it to perceive threats effectively.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, indicating some ability to detect nearby dangers.
additional_information: Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage when curled.
Can knock targets prone with its tail slap attack.
Passive perception score of 13 aids in detecting threats.
Possesses a natural armor that increases its durability in combat.
Uncurls as a bonus action, allowing for strategic movement.
test_queries: large beast that curls into a ball
